This website is a data analysis project that compares equity prices changes (ETFs) to various date and time intervals.  The analysis will be primarily visual and descriptive.d

```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
aesr <- as_tibble(read.csv("data/daily/us/nyse\ etfs/1/aesr.us.txt", check.names = FALSE))
aesr |>
  drop_na() |>
  ggplot(aes(x = `<DATE>`, y = `<OPEN>`)) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(
      title = "Analysis of equity price changes per day - NYSE ETF - AESR",
      x = "Date",
      y = "Opening price"
    )
```
